StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_SearchStoredProcs]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SearchString varchar(100) AS
SET @SearchString = '%' + @SearchString + '%'
SET NOCOUNT ON
--- CREATE TEMP TABLE TO HOLD DATA FROM SYSTEM TABLES CREATE TABLE #TEMP (PROC_TYPE varchar(25), PROC_NAME sysname)
--- RETRIEVE DATA FROM SYSTEM TABLES INTO TEMP TABLE INSERT INTO #TEMP (PROC_TYPE, PROC_NAME) SELECT CASE O.XTYPE WHEN 'P' THEN 'STORED PROCEDURE' WHEN 'TR' THEN 'TRIGGER' WHEN 'FN' THEN 'USER DEFINED FUNCTION' END AS PROC_TYPE, O.NAME AS PROC_NAME FROM SYSOBJECTS O INNER JOIN SYSCOMMENTS C ON (O.ID = C.ID AND O.XTYPE IN ('P' , 'TR', 'FN') AND C.TEXT LIKE @SearchString)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
--- FILTER OUT DUPLICATE NAMES AND RETURN THE DATA SELECT DISTINCT CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), T.PROC_NAME) AS [PROCEDURE], T.PROC_TYPE FROM #TEMP T ORDER BY [PROCEDURE]
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #TEMP
